## Matrix.scale() method

Compute a new matrix set with the current matrix values multiplied by scale (float)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
scale(scale: number): Matrix;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scale | <code>number</code> | defines the scale factor |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Matrix`

a new matrix
